entry.content:

userMapper.findByå¯¹åº”çš„ SQL è¯­å¥å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

SELECT u.id,
       u.name,
       total_consumption_times, # å¤æ‚çš„ count
       total_consumption_amount, # å¤æ‚çš„ sum
       u.last_consumption_time
FROM user u
where ...
order by u.create_time desc;

æˆ‘æœŸæœ›å®ƒäº§ç”Ÿçš„ count è¯­å¥æ˜¯ï¼š

SELECT count(0)
FROM (SELECT 0
      FROM user u
      where ...) table_count;

ä½†å®é™…å®ƒäº§ç”Ÿçš„ count è¯­å¥å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´å¾ˆé•¿ã€‚

SELECT count(0)
FROM (SELECT u.id,
             u.name,
             total_consumption_times,  # å¤æ‚çš„ count
             total_consumption_amount, # å¤æ‚çš„ sum
             u.last_consumption_time
      FROM user u
      where ...) table_count;
